channel.title: Castle-Pk server/client development. Recruiting starts 2008 04 18
channel.description:
[center][b]Castle-Pk Development Page[/b] Why you should join the project:
We are working for best MoparScape private server place. We should have good graphics but not bad staff. We should have great server but not lame one. We should put much of us in to this project. If we do all this, we will be heroes !!!
So if you readed that quote from my mind you also need to see if you have what it takes to become a staff of out project. Just read the othe quote ok?
What you need to become staff: Know how to code. Some idead how you do your job. Expirience in the job you want. Be friendly and not EMO . JOB you want: And lastly how much are you online. - We do not care what your age. - We do not care if others don't like you. If you work good you will not get knocked out. - We do not care if you want other out-on this project we must keep friendship. - We care if you say somphin bad like cencure. You must keep talking nice about others
Now you only need to participate and wait for the answer. Good luck :) Quick list of staff: Staff leader: Hot Babe Client coding: Ideas: * Coding: * Tester: * Server coding: Ideas: * Coding: * Tester: * Forum'/web: Ideas and creating: * _______________________ Sorry if you found any gramatic mistakes-im not good at gramatic..[/center] Left to start recruiting: ~1 day
